snippet: A pointed campaign urges advertisers, marketers and media planners to break their traditional focus on young consumers.
abstract: Andrew Adam Newman Advertising column highlights AARP's new campaign.
lead_paragraph: A pointed campaign urges advertisers, marketers and media planners to break their traditional focus on young consumers.

headline.seo: AARP Campaign Tries to Persuade Advertisers
headline.main: In AARP’s View, Advertisers Need to Focus
headline.print_headline: In AARP’s View, Advertisers Need to Focus
